humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the patient has been diagnosed with moderately differentiated invasive ductal carcinoma and has been classified as pT2N3a. According to the AJCC staging system, N3a indicates metastases in 4 or more axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pT2N3a' part of the tumor classification in the report indicates that the tumor has a size of 3.5 cm or larger (pT2) and has metastasized to 4-9 axillary lymph nodes (N3a). Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N3.
